column4: If I recall there is a command that will create the xorg.conf file that you system uses as it's default if none is found and you can edit that
I wish I could use the Nvidia driver, but it crashes my Xorg so many times! I get something like 7-8 crashes per day and I really cannot stand it.
mmm.... no I can't use it, it's pretty the same I was using when I used Nvidia driver, but too many things change
